name: Movement Discovery Program
description: Fun-based program introducing fundamental movement skills through play and exploration. Focus on enjoyment and building physical literacy. Based on LTAD Active Start principles.

name: ABC Athletic Foundation
description: Structured program developing Agility, Balance, Coordination, and Speed through fun activities and games. Multi-sport approach to build athletic foundation. Based on LTAD FUNdamentals stage.

name: Athletic Skills Development
description: Comprehensive program focusing on fundamental movement skills and introduction to sport-specific training. Window of accelerated learning for motor skills. Based on LTAD Learn to Train stage.

name: Athletic Performance Foundation
description: Periodized program building aerobic base, strength foundation, and sport-specific skills. Introduction to formal training concepts. Based on LTAD Train to Train stage.

name: Competitive Performance Program
description: Advanced periodized training for competitive athletes. Sport-specific strength, power, and conditioning. Based on LTAD Train to Compete stage.

name: Basketball Fundamentals
description: Introduction to basketball skills including dribbling, passing, and shooting basics. Focus on fun and skill development over competition.

name: Basketball Skills & Games
description: Developing basketball-specific skills including ball handling, shooting form, and basic defensive positioning. Introduction to small-sided games.

name: Basketball Performance Training
description: Comprehensive basketball development combining skill work, basketball-specific conditioning, and introduction to team concepts.

name: Soccer FUNdamentals
description: Introduction to soccer through fun activities focusing on ball mastery, basic passing, and small-sided games.

name: Soccer Technical Development
description: Building technical foundation including dribbling, passing, receiving, and shooting. Introduction to positional concepts.

name: Soccer Performance Program
description: Comprehensive soccer training combining technical work, tactical development, and soccer-specific fitness.

name: Learn to Swim Program
description: Building water safety and basic stroke development. Focus on comfort in water and introduction to competitive strokes.

name: Stroke Development Program
description: Developing all four competitive strokes, starts, and turns. Building aerobic base through technique-focused training.

name: Competitive Swimming Development
description: Periodized swim training building aerobic capacity, stroke efficiency, and race-specific preparation.

name: Running & Jumping Fundamentals
description: Introduction to track and field through fun running, jumping, and throwing activities. Building speed and coordination.

name: Track & Field Multi-Event
description: Exposure to multiple events including sprints, distance, jumps, and throws. Developing event-specific technique.

name: Event Specialization Training
description: Focused training for chosen event group (sprints/hurdles, distance, jumps, throws) with appropriate conditioning.

name: Tee Ball Fundamentals
description: Introduction to baseball/softball through tee ball. Focus on throwing, catching, and batting basics.

name: Baseball Skills Development
description: Developing throwing mechanics, fielding fundamentals, and hitting off pitching. Introduction to game situations.

name: Complete Player Development
description: Comprehensive baseball training including advanced hitting, position-specific skills, and baseball-specific conditioning.

name: Flag Football Fundamentals
description: Introduction to football through non-contact flag football. Focus on catching, throwing, and movement skills.

name: Football Skills Foundation
description: Developing football fundamentals including passing, receiving, and proper tackling form (Heads Up Football).

name: Football Position Development
description: Position-specific skill development combined with football strength and conditioning program.

name: Red Ball Tennis
description: Introduction to tennis using modified equipment (red balls, shorter racquets, smaller courts). Focus on fun and basic stroke development.

name: Orange/Green Ball Development
description: Progressive tennis development using orange and green balls. Building all strokes and introduction to match play.

name: Competitive Tennis Training
description: Full-court tennis training with yellow balls. Developing all shots, movement, and tactical awareness.

name: Volleyball Introduction
description: Fun introduction to volleyball focusing on passing, setting, and basic movement. Using lighter balls and lower nets.

name: Volleyball Skills Development
description: Building passing, setting, serving, and attacking fundamentals. Introduction to game concepts.

name: Volleyball Performance Training
description: Comprehensive volleyball training including all skills, position-specific work, and volleyball-specific conditioning.
